text:
="preserve">Itraconazole (i tra ko' na zole) is a medication used to treat fungal infections of the lungs and other parts of the body.
How the medication is given.
Itraconazole comes as a pill (capsule) and also as a liquid (solution) and they are taken by mouth.
How to get the medication.
Itraconazole is prescribed by a doctor and sold by a pharmacist.
